BlackNightmare/Windlord/Rodimus/Windlord/Sedna/Nightstrike::

"Hellplague you're a real fool!!!!" roared BlackNightmare while she 
and Darkfate took NightStrike and started to retreat, but that let 
them fire some shots against Proto and Malice.

Windlord took off and tried to reach HellPlague and the Sweep that 
hold Organics. 

Sedna lockated at the Sweep and Organic and regarding tha she was 
higed than them she tried a dangerous strategy. She manouverat her 
wing with out fly in that way that she reached them and attemped to 
grab Organic and shot an energy ball against the Sweep.

Rodimus was supriced an alarmed, he knew that a Vork was controled 
Nightlight's body and she, suppostly had to be insolated in order 
that The vork being not be amenace to others... but what are she 
doing there??? what would happen next?





--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "The Ultimate Archfiend of Darkness, 
Devouring" <bustercross365@y...> wrote:
> Organics/ Hellplague/ Necross/ Malice/ Sweeps:
> 
> As the shearing sheet of metal exploded from the ground, 
Hellplague 
> roared.  Not in pain, but rage.  Her arms were not severed, but 
just 
> as useless.  They hung limply at her sides, as she fell back, two 
> Sweeps came and picked up their master.  Another came and picked 
up 
> the critically damaged Organics.  The Sweeps carried them into the 
> air and hung, as a Sweep attempted to repair Hellplague's arms.
> 
> Organics nearly passed out as Proto launched his ambush.  Though 
he 
> succeeded in disabling Hellplague, an edge of th metal sheet dug 
deep 
> into Organics' back, disabling her wings and limited the use of 
her 
> legs.  The Sweep who retrieved her roughly grabbed her about he 
waist 
> and jerked her with it.  
> 
> Necross rushed up and and opened fire with his acid blaster and 
> missile blaster.
> 
> Malice let a low gowl slip fom his throat.  
> "If only I had Sunstorm or other Seekers..!  This has gone on far 
too 
> long!"
> Malice turned his hateful glare to those who did not move.
> "Stay back cowards!  Interfer, and I send you to the Allspark!"
> He then marched forward, Chaos Breaker ready, and charged the 
> minions, Proto, and the Sweeps, not caring who was in his way.  
All 
> that mattered was the safe return of his sister Organics.
> 
> 
>
